Comments_List: I immensely developed my skills as a historian.
This course was a tremendous opportunity to dive into a specific subject of interest not found elsewhere. It has definitely helped with my research and in preparation for my thesis.
The ability to study something not offered at Yale and at my own pace is so rewarding. I highly recommend!!
